timeline.message: Ported clients and remote api pages
Ported Sequencing runs and announcements pages to admin panel, and completed tests
Changed side menu width and refactored sequencing runs and remote api admin pages

timeline.bodyText: Add tests for the individual buttons on those pages as well. Such as the Add User button on the Users List etc. to make sure the functionality is intact.
timeline.author: deepsidhu85

replies.bodyText: I have now added tests for visibility of the individual buttons.

timeline.message: Moved Announcements and Clients to admin directory, and modified their tests to work in new location
Added ClientsAjaxController and UIAnnouncementsService to better separate controllers, added button visibility tests to AdminPageIT
Changed test to reflect new sequencing runs route
